body:
<!-- Anything that looks like this is a comment and can't be seen after the Pull Request is created. -->

# PR Summary

Linux file paths are case sensitive. DSC compiler was not able to find base schemas because of folder name inconsistency.
Fixed inconsistent naming of folder and schema file extension.
